Workflow.Name: BestPractice_Framework
Workflow.Inputs: {"schema":{"required":["In_intMaxRetry","In_strAppURL","In_intControlTimeOut","In_intPageTimeOut","In_strAppUserName","In_strAppPassword"],"properties":{"In_intMaxRetry":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"This integer variable will be used as basis how many times the automation will retry the processing of the transaction","format":null,"title":"In_intMaxRetry","type":"number","value":"3"},"In_strAppURL":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"This text variable will hold the Application URL which is the parameter needed to launch application","format":null,"title":"In_strAppURL","type":"string","value":""},"In_intControlTimeOut":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"This integer variable will set the time out value for waiting for the common controls (buttons, text, label etc,)","format":null,"title":"In_intControlTimeOut","type":"number","value":"30"},"In_intPageTimeOut":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"This integer variable will set the time out value for waiting on the Main Pages of the Web Application","format":null,"title":"In_intPageTimeOut","type":"number","value":"60"},"In_strAppUserName":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":"password","title":"In_strAppUserName","type":"string","value":null},"In_strAppPassword":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":"password","title":"In_strAppPassword","type":"string","value":null}},"type":"object"}}
Workflow.Outputs: {"schema":{"properties":{"Out_strWorkExceptionMessage":{"default":"","description":"This text variable will hold the business exception reason for why the work was not successful","format":null,"title":"Out_strWorkExceptionMessage","type":"string","value":null},"Out_boolWorkcompleted":{"default":"","description":"This boolean variable will serve as a basis if the work has been completed as expected or if there's a business exception encountered. ","format":null,"title":"Out_boolWorkcompleted","type":"boolean","value":null}},"type":"object"}}
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Local computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: [In_strAppUserName, In_strAppPassword]
@INPUT In_intMaxRetry : { 'Description': 'This integer variable will be used as basis how many times the automation will retry the processing of the transaction', 'FriendlyName': 'In_intMaxRetry', 'DefaultValue': 3, 'Type': 'Numeric' } 
@INPUT In_strAppURL : { 'Description': 'This text variable will hold the Application URL which is the parameter needed to launch application', 'FriendlyName': 'In_strAppURL', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT In_intControlTimeOut : { 'Description': 'This integer variable will set the time out value for waiting for the common controls (buttons, text, label etc,)', 'FriendlyName': 'In_intControlTimeOut', 'DefaultValue': 30, 'Type': 'Numeric' } 
@INPUT In_intPageTimeOut : { 'Description': 'This integer variable will set the time out value for waiting on the Main Pages of the Web Application', 'FriendlyName': 'In_intPageTimeOut', 'DefaultValue': 60, 'Type': 'Numeric' } 
@INPUT In_strAppUserName : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'In_strAppUserName', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT In_strAppPassword : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'In_strAppPassword', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@OUTPUT Out_strWorkExceptionMessage : { 'Description': 'This text variable will hold the business exception reason for why the work was not successful', 'FriendlyName': 'Out_strWorkExceptionMessage', 'Type': 'String' } 
@OUTPUT Out_boolWorkcompleted : { 'Description': 'This boolean variable will serve as a basis if the work has been completed as expected or if there\'s a business exception encountered. ', 'FriendlyName': 'Out_boolWorkcompleted', 'Type': 'Bool' } 
/# Process Name: BestPractice_Framework
Process Descripton: Provide here what the process are trying to accomplish...
Created By: Rose Biacolo
Created Date: June 8, 2023#/
**REGION Initialization_Stage
# Note: These group of actions will initialize automation variables, create directories/files and launch the required application that are needed for the entire run of the automation
CALL Sys_Kill_Edge_Sessions
CALL Sys_Initialize_Variables
CALL Sys_Create_Directories
CALL Edge_Start_Applications
**ENDREGION
**REGION Process_Stage
# Note: These group of actions inside the 'On block Error' will perform the steps needed to fullfill the task (Process Name) and if a technical exception was encountered the flow will reattempt to do the actions starting from the beginning of the block until the max retry limit was reached which was set using the input variable (In_intMaxRetry).
BLOCK Process_Retry_Mechanism
ON BLOCK ERROR all
 CALL Sys_Kill_Edge_Sessions
 SET intRetryCounter TO intRetryCounter + 1
 CALL Edge_Start_Applications
 REPEAT BLOCK
END
 IF intRetryCounter < In_intMaxRetry THEN
 CALL Main_Process
 ELSE
 SET boolShutdownFlow TO True
 END
END
**ENDREGION
**REGION ShutdownFlow_Stage
IF boolShutdownFlow = True THEN
 ERROR => strFlowErrorMessage Reset: True
 EXIT Code: 0 ErrorMessage: $'''Unable to complete the flow execution due to technical exception - %strFlowErrorMessage['SubflowName']%: %strFlowErrorMessage['ErrorDetails']%, %strFlowErrorMessage['Message']%'''
END
**ENDREGION
FUNCTION Sys_Kill_Edge_Sessions GLOBAL
 **REGION Kill_All_Open_MSEdge_Sessions
 System.TerminateProcess.TerminateProcessByName ProcessName: $'''msedge'''
 ON ERROR

 END
 WAIT 1
 **ENDREGION
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Sys_Initialize_Variables GLOBAL
 /# Subflow Name: Sys_Initialize_Variables
Subflow Descripton: This subflow will initialize all variables(number, text, boolean, datatables and lists) that will be used in this entire run.
Created By: Rose Biacolo
Created Date: June 12, 2023#/
 **REGION Initialize Text Variables
 SET strFlowErrorMessage TO $'''%''%'''
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Initialize Number Variables
 SET intRetryCounter TO 0
 SET intStartAppRetryCounter TO 0
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Initialize Boolean Variables
 SET boolShutdownFlow TO False
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Initialize Datatable Variables
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Initialize Lists Variables
 **ENDREGION
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Sys_Create_Directories GLOBAL
 /# Subflow Name: Sys_Create_Directories
Subflow Descripton: This subflow will create all folders and files required for the flow run
datatables and lists) that will be used in this entire run.
Created By: Rose Biacolo
Created Date: June 12, 2023#/
 **REGION Get_Machine_Username
 System.GetEnvironmentVariable.GetEnvironmentVariable Name: $'''USERNAME''' Value=> strMachineUserName
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Creation_Automation_Directories
 **ENDREGION
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Edge_Start_Applications GLOBAL
 /# Subflow Name: Edge_Start_Applications
Subflow Descripton: This subflow will launch and Log in to the application, this has a built in retry mechanism and will shutdown the flow incase credentials was incorrect or application was down
Created By: Rose Biacolo
Created Date: June 12, 2023#/
 BLOCK Start_Applications_Retry_Mechanism
ON BLOCK ERROR all
SET intStartAppRetryCounter TO intStartAppRetryCounter + 1
CALL Sys_Kill_Edge_Sessions
REPEAT BLOCK
END
 IF intStartAppRetryCounter < In_intMaxRetry THEN
 **REGION Launch_Applications
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Login
 **ENDREGION
 ELSE
 SET boolShutdownFlow TO True
 END
 END
 **REGION ShutdownFlow_UnableToLogin
 IF boolShutdownFlow = True THEN
 EXIT Code: 0 ErrorMessage: $'''Unable to login to application after %In_intMaxRetry% number of attempts made, Please check your access credentials or you may try to log in again later as the application might not be available at this time.'''
 END
 **ENDREGION
 **REGION Reset_Variables
 SET intStartAppRetryCounter TO 0
 SET boolShutdownFlow TO False
 **ENDREGION
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Main_Process GLOBAL
END FUNCTION
"
